doc: Example Asset Pipeline module. The 'module-name' needs to be unique among all module files.

config.doc: Using defaults from world.module.json, except we override the 'generate-dir', the 'texture-dir' and specify 'autoload'.

cache-options.doc: All we need to specify is the URL source and the filter profile; no advanced config.

config.doc: Note the file name is a .png. The file will be converted from .jpg by the filters.

options.doc: Since we are using the default loader and no other options, we don't actually need the options section at all.

textures.doc: The resource-name value should be unique. It is used to specify the resource in the layouts.

cache-options.doc: NOTE: The filter profile 'ArtJpg' is defined in the world.module.json file.

config.doc: The file name is the name used in the cache and may be different than the source name.

resources.doc: This example specifies only textures resources. (You can leave the 'materials' and 'objects' sections out.)

layouts.doc: Object layouts for the art show area. Note that the art show is previously defined in the furniture.model.json file.

options.doc: No options, use defaults from furniture.model.json. (You can leave this options section out.)

data.doc: The panel 'artshow.artpnl-1-ew-1-0' is from the layouts in the furniture.model.json file.
The place-name is used as the base name for placed objects located on artshow.artpnl-1-ew-1-1.

options.doc: The 'ArtPlacer' uses the data below to size and position the art.

moreInfoData.title: Ai Weiwei
moreInfoData.text: Ai Weiwei is a Chinese contemporary artist, active in sculpture, installation, architecture, curating, photography, film, and social, political and cultural. These photos are from an exhibit held of his work on Alcatraz island in the former prison buildings in 2015.

data.doc: The textures are specified in the 'resources' section.

textures.doc: Size and position must fit with panel size of X=0.6 and Y=1.
Size should reflect proportions of original image.

data.doc: The place-on value lets you specify 'front' or 'back' of the panel.
The place-name is used as the base name for placed objects located on artshow.artpnl-1-ew-1-1.

moreInfoData.title: Ai Weiwei
moreInfoData.text: Ai Weiwei is a Chinese contemporary artist, active in sculpture, installation, architecture, curating, photography, film, and social, political and cultural. These photos are from an exhibit held of his work on Alcatraz island in the former prison buildings in 2015.

data.doc: The textures are specified in the 'resources' section.

textures.doc: Position starts from upper left, so [0, 0] is the upper left corner.

data.doc: The place-on value lets you specify 'front' or 'back' of the panel.

moreInfoData.title: Kathryn Duval
moreInfoData.text: Kathryn is located in Hilo Hawaii. She’s interested in alternate realities of nature.

moreInfoData.title: Kathryn Duval
moreInfoData.text: Kathryn is located in Hilo Hawaii. She’s interested in alternate realities of nature.

data.doc: The table 'GoHArtExhibitTables.GoHArtExhibitTable-0' is from the layouts in the furniture.model.json file.
The place-name is used as the base name for placed objects located on GoHArtExhibitTables.GoHArtExhibitTable-0.

options.doc: The 'TablePlacer' uses the data below to size and position the art.

moreInfoData.title: Table Test 1
moreInfoData.text: This is just a test popup.

textures.doc: Size and position must fit with table size of X=0.9 and Y=0.375.
Size should reflect proportions of original image.

data.doc: The origin-corner value lets you specify what corner of the table is the origin point for X/Y co-ordinates, values are 'nw', 'ne', 'sw', and 'se'. Note that the user spawns in the NW corner of Squid Hall facing SE.
